description: The `ballerinax/sap.successfactors.ecemploymentinformation` package provides APIs that enable seamless integration with the [SAP SuccessFactors Employment Information API v1.0](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_SUCCESSFACTORS_PLATFORM/d599f15995d348a1b45ba5603e2aba9b/d91ecc323849441cb2773fc86f0eff0f.html). The service allows to access employment related information, including job information, employment termination, and work permit.
